DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study RT001 Treat Moderate Severe Lateral Canthal Lines
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center study evaluate safety efficacy four different dos RT001 compare vehicle apply single , bilateral topical application least 60 subject moderate severe lateral canthal line . Subjects randomize one five treatment group 1:1:1:1:1 ratio . Follow-up visit schedule 28 day post-treatment . The safety efficacy Cohort 1 ( Day 14 visit ) assess prior decision enroll subject Cohort 2 additional dos treatment regimen need evaluate .
